Was selected to the 2019 Allstar game...

Injured on 9/11/2021 with a Strained Back, out for one week...

Traded from Atlanta to Tampa Bay on 1/31/2027 (Going to ATL: 2B Hyo-Joon Park, CF Florentino Gonzales, 3B Joshua Trotta. Going to TB: 3B Bob Masterson, 2B Dermis Garcia)...
